snippet: The two judges sent the money-laundering case against Jacob Ostreicher back to the trial judge.
abstract: Appeals panel in Bolivia refuses to release Jacob Ostreicher, New York businessman who has been jailed for 18 months without charge despite strong evidence he was fleeced and extorted by corrupt prosecutors, instead sending his case back to trial judge.
lead_paragraph: The two judges sent the money-laundering case against Jacob Ostreicher back to the trial judge.

headline.main: Bolivian Court Refuses to Free Jailed American Businessman
headline.print_headline: Bolivia: Court Refuses to Free Jailed American Businessman
